title: Doris Schmidauer - Wikipedia
snippet: Doris Schmidauer (born 21 September 1963) is an Austrian environmentalist and party official for the Green Party. Schmidauer has served as the First Lady of Austria since January 2017 as the wife of Austrian President Alexander Van der Bellen.

title: First Lady of Austria - Wikipedia
snippet: First Lady of Austria (German: Ehepartner des österreichischen Bundespräsidenten) is the title attributed to the wife (or, in place of a wife, a designee, such as a daughter) of the president of Austria. The current first lady is Doris Schmidauer, wife of President Alexander Van der Bellen, ...

title: Doris Schmidauer
snippet: Doris Schmidauer married Alexander Van der Bellen in December 2015, following a longtime personal relationship.[13][14] The union was confirmed publicly by the Austrian Green Party on December 29, 2015, noting Van der Bellen's request for discretion amid his candidacy for the federal presidency.[13] This marriage marked Van der Bellen's second, after the death of his first wife in 2013, and occurred privately without children from the partnership.[14] The couple established their shared residence in Vienna, where they have maintained a joint household since the marriage.[15] Public records ind

title: About: Doris Schmidauer
snippet: Doris Schmidauer (born 21 September 1963) is an Austrian environmentalist and party official for the Green Party. Schmidauer has served as the First Lady of Austria since January 2017 as the wife of Austrian President Alexander Van der Bellen.

title: Doris Schmidauer – Better Time Stories
snippet: Doris Schmidauer, the project patroness, is the First Lady of Austria and the wife of President Alexander Van der Bellen. She is a strong advocate for environmental protection and social justice.
